elements.name: Keyboard shortcuts modal displays correctly via button click

steps.name: I am on the MarkVim homepage
I click the keyboard shortcuts button
the keyboard shortcuts modal should be visible
the modal should have title "Keyboard Shortcuts"
the shortcuts should be properly categorized

elements.name: Keyboard shortcuts modal displays correctly via question mark key

steps.name: I am on the MarkVim homepage
I press "?"
the keyboard shortcuts modal should be visible
the modal should have title "Keyboard Shortcuts"
the shortcuts should be properly categorized

elements.name: Keyboard shortcuts modal shows all expected categories

steps.name: I am on the MarkVim homepage
I click the keyboard shortcuts button
the modal should display category "Navigation"
the modal should display category "View"
the modal should display category "File"
the modal should display category "Settings"
the modal should display category "Help"
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I click the keyboard shortcuts button
there should be no duplicate shortcuts displayed
each shortcut should appear only once
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I click the keyboard shortcuts button
the modal should contain shortcut "Open command palette"
the modal should contain shortcut "Switch to Editor only"
the modal should contain shortcut "Switch to Split view"
the modal should contain shortcut "Switch to Preview only"
the modal should contain shortcut "Toggle sidebar"
the modal should contain shortcut "Save document"
the modal should contain shortcut "New Document"
the modal should contain shortcut "Download as Markdown"
the modal should contain shortcut "Open settings"
the modal should contain shortcut "Show keyboard shortcuts"
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I click the keyboard shortcuts button
the modal should contain shortcut "Toggle Line Numbers"
the shortcut "Toggle Line Numbers" should use key "L"
the modal should contain shortcut "Toggle Preview Sync"
the shortcut "Toggle Preview Sync" should use key "P"
the modal should contain shortcut "Toggle Vim Mode"
the shortcut "Toggle Vim Mode" should use key "V"

elements.name: Single key settings shortcuts work functionally

steps.name: I am on the MarkVim homepage
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I press "l"
line numbers should be toggled
I press "p"
preview sync should be toggled
I press "v"
vim mode should be toggled
the vim mode indicator should show the new state

elements.name: Modal can be opened both ways

steps.name: I am on the MarkVim homepage
I click the keyboard shortcuts button
the keyboard shortcuts modal should be visible
I press "Escape"
the keyboard shortcuts modal should not be visible
I press "?"
the keyboard shortcuts modal should be visible

elements.name: Modal can be closed with escape key

steps.name: I am on the MarkVim homepage
the keyboard shortcuts modal is open
I press "Escape"
the keyboard shortcuts modal should not be visible
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I click the keyboard shortcuts button
shortcuts should display formatted key combinations
single keys should be displayed properly
modifier keys should use platform-specific symbols
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I click the keyboard shortcuts button
all shortcuts should have visible key combinations
no shortcuts should be missing key bindings
settings shortcuts should have proper key combinations
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I switch to editor view
the editor pane should be visible
the preview pane should not be visible
I switch to preview view
the preview pane should be visible
the editor pane should not be visible
I switch to split view
both editor and preview panes should be visible
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I open the command palette
the command palette should be visible
the search input should be focused
I press the key "Escape"
element with testid "command-palette" should not be visible
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I press the key "Cmd+K"
element with testid "command-palette" should be visible
I press the key "Escape"
I press the key "Ctrl+K"
element with testid "command-palette" should be visible
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I create a new document
the MarkVim UI should be fully loaded
the document list should be visible

elements.name: View mode preference persists across page reloads

steps.name: I am on the MarkVim homepage
I am on the MarkVim homepage
I switch to editor view
the editor pane should be visible
the preview pane should not be visible
the view mode should be stored in localStorage as "editor"
I reload the page
the editor pane should be visible
the preview pane should not be visible
the view mode should be "editor"
I switch to preview view
the preview pane should be visible
the editor pane should not be visible
the view mode should be stored in localStorage as "preview"
I reload the page
the preview pane should be visible
the editor pane should not be visible
the view mode should be "preview"
I open the MarkVim homepage
the following elements are visible
I open the MarkVim homepage
I press "Cmd+K"
the command palette should be visible
the search input should be focused
I open the MarkVim homepage
both editor and preview panes should be visible
the view mode toggle should be present
I open the MarkVim homepage
the document list should be visible
the create document button should be present
I open the MarkVim homepage
I click on element with testid "delete-document-btn"
element with testid "delete-confirm-modal" should be visible
element with testid "delete-confirm-btn" should be visible
element with testid "delete-cancel-btn" should be visible
I click on element with testid "delete-confirm-btn"
element with testid "delete-confirm-modal" should not be visible
a new document should be created automatically

elements.name: Create note and edit with vim motions

steps.name: I open the MarkVim homepage
I create a new document
a new document should be created automatically
I focus the editor
I press "i" to enter insert mode
I type "# My Test Note" in the editor
I press "Escape" to exit insert mode
I press "o" to create new line and enter insert mode
I type "This is a **bold** text with vim motions." in the editor
I press "Escape" to exit insert mode
the preview should contain "My Test Note"
the preview should contain "This is a bold text with vim motions."
the preview should have rendered markdown formatting

elements.name: Keyboard shortcuts for view mode switching

steps.name: I open the MarkVim homepage
I press "1"
the editor pane should be visible
the preview pane should not be visible
I press "2"
both editor and preview panes should be visible
I press "3"
the preview pane should be visible
the editor pane should not be visible
I open the MarkVim homepage
the document list should be visible
I toggle the sidebar with keyboard shortcut
element with testid "document-list" should not be visible
I toggle the sidebar with keyboard shortcut
element with testid "document-list" should be visible
